name: v3 Code System EntityStatus
description: Codes representing the defined possible states of an Entity, as defined by the Entity class state machine.

property.description: True if the concept is not considered active - e.g. not a valid concept any more

concept.definition: The 'typical' state. Excludes "nullified" which represents the termination state of an Entity record instance that was created in error.
The state representing the fact that the Entity record is currently active.
Definition: The state representing the fact that the entity is inactive.
The state representing the normal termination of an Entity record.
The state representing the termination of an Entity record instance that was created in error.
